titles.title: A bill for the relief of Matt Clawson.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Courts and Administrative Practice.
Considered by Subcommittee on Courts and Administrative Practice.

bill.summary: 5/5/1993--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a specified sum to a named individual in full settlement of claims against the United States for losses resulting from reliance on the approval of the Forest Service of his claim for a specified placer mine in the vicinity of Salmon River in Idaho.
